title: National Basketball Association all-time minutes leaders 1946 to 2020
summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing NBA player, and Number of minutes played in each NBA player on the y axis.
The Number of minutes played is highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.
The Number of minutes played of NBA player Bill Russell is 1.41% smaller than the maximum value at Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.
min_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing NBA player, and Number of minutes played in each NBA player on the y axis.
The Number of minutes played is highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing NBA player in the x axis and Number of minutes played in the y axis.
The Number of minutes played is highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.
There is a difference of 16720.0 between the maximum NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and minimum NBA player Bill Russell.
The NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar has the highest Number of minutes played, followed by Karl Malone, and Dirk Nowitzki. Down to the NBA player Bill Russell which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Number of minutes played in all 30 NBA players is roughly 46312.27.
The Number of minutes played is 1389368.0 if we add up values of all NBA players.
